name: Machine Slayer - Prototype
description:
Machine Slayer - 0.3.0.3

Your goal is to shoot the robot that's on top of the "arena".

WASD to move.

Left mouse button ( hold or tap ) to shoot.

Right mouse button to dash.

F to pick up guns.

R to reload.

O to disable/enable FPS ( at the top right )

Escape ( esc ) to exit the game.

Not tested on Linux and Mac.
